title: Recommendations for typeface with great roman numerals to use for movie title sequence
content:
Hi,

Does anyone have any recommendations for a typeface to use for a movie title sequence that has handsome roman numerals?

Or just general suggestions for typefaces that work well for movie title sequences?

Thanks!
author: bfingeroth

comments.content: Roman numerals are just letters, of course. Personally, I like the Roman numerals on antique clock faces, typically in a condensed face with pronounced serifs like Onyx.
